metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6918 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
salt before 2015.5.5 leaks git usernames and passwords to the log.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-common - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
salt-master - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
salt-minion - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
salt-ssh - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
salt-syndic - 0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: salt package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.5+ds-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
